ci.description: Skip the interactive TUI and validate against CI rules

highestUserWastedRatio.description: (only valid with --ci given) highest allowable percentage of bytes wasted (as a ratio between 0-1), otherwise CI validation will fail. (default 0.1)

highestUserWastedBytes.description: (only valid with --ci given) highest allowable bytes wasted, otherwise CI validation will fail. Set -1 mean disabled

lowestEfficiencyRatio.description: (only valid with --ci given) lowest allowable image efficiency (as a ratio between 0-1), otherwise CI validation will fail. (default 0.9)

ignoreError.description: ignore image parsing errors and run the analysis anyway

source.description: he container engine to fetch the image from. Allowed values: docker, podman, docker-archive (default docker)

dockerSocket.description: The docker socket to use for the analysis
